author: mrmitch
title: 18 Wheel sized truck without the Trailer
review: This truck is a litte bigger than what you might expect. It is made to be a Tractor truck that has been fixed up to a drag truck. Cool looking truck with adjustable spoiler on the rear of it. Simple clean lines of all of the early 90's Town sets. Straight foward instructions that are easy to follow. Good set - good looking - Go LEGO Go.

author: hustla187
title: 18 Wheeling Beast
review: This is a very cool truck and it's a racing one too. I like the color cordination in this set and the spoiler piece is nice also. The front of the truck is pretty good too. Overall, this is a very grand set.

author: ale8oneboy
title: Beast of a Rig
review: I can remember my older brother giving me this set as a kid. I thought the side pipes were the coolest thing ever. I used them on virtually every vehicle build after-wards. It was a very stable kit and easy to build. I enjoyed all the extra special pieces that came with it. At the time a lot of the special pieces were new to me. I had a lot of sets at the time. But this set I remember more than most.
